original_title: Obama supports Newsom redistricting to counter Texas gerrymandering | Fox News
article_summary: California Governor Gavin Newsom aims to abolish the state's redistricting laws to add more Democratic seats, a move praised by former President Barack Obama. This plan is intended as a countermeasure to a Republican-led redistricting effort in Texas. However, Republican lawmaker Rep. Kevin Kiley opposes Newsom's proposal, arguing it would disregard the will of voters.</s>
